sys_remote_update_set.description:
1. Setting up the Xactware pager email address onto selected service offerings. Details needed: a. Email address - #ITOps Team Leads <#itopsteamleads@verisk.com> b. List of service offerings – Hardik has sent the details. Ryan is working on confirming the service offering list.
3. Setting up email alert on selection of XW group in servicenow: On routing ticket to these selected XW groups, the ticket will be auto closed and an email will be triggered to the requestor with steps to open incident in JIRA. Details needed: a. Cleaned up list of XW groups. - Met Hardik and Jason last week to go over the XW group list. Team is working on the action items. b. Email subject and format –
Xactware IT operations team doesn't monitor the Service Now queue. They use OSD (Operations Support Desk) JIRA ticket system to run their operations.
So kindly request the Xactware employees to raise the requests/incidents to Xactware IT operations team only through the OSD (Operations Support Desk) JIRA system using the below link https://jira.xactware.com/servicedesk/customer/portal/1/group/6
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Xactware Email Updates
